inputs.name: Contrasts
inputs.description: Matrix of t-statics contrasts.

inputs.name: Dat norm
inputs.description: Switch on normalization of the data time series to unit std deviation.

inputs.name: Demean
inputs.description: Switch on demeaining of design and data.

inputs.name: Des norm
inputs.description: Switch on normalization of the design matrix columns to unit std deviation.

inputs.name: Design
inputs.description: File name of the glm design matrix (text time courses for temporal regression or an image file for spatial regression).

inputs.name: Dof
inputs.description: Set degrees of freedom explicitly.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: Input file name (text matrix or 3d/4d image file).

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: Mask image file name if input is image.

inputs.name: Out cope
inputs.description: Output file name for cope (either as txt or image.

inputs.name: Out data name
inputs.description: Output file name for pre-processed data.

inputs.name: Out f name
inputs.description: Output file name for f-value of full model fit.

inputs.name: Out p name
inputs.description: Output file name for p-values of z-stats (either as text file or image).

inputs.name: Out pf name
inputs.description: Output file name for p-value for full model fit.

inputs.name: Out res name
inputs.description: Output file name for residuals.

inputs.name: Out sigsq name
inputs.description: Output file name for residual noise variance sigma-square.

inputs.name: Out t name
inputs.description: Output file name for t-stats (either as txt or image.

inputs.name: Out varcb name
inputs.description: Output file name for variance of copes.

inputs.name: Out vnscales name
inputs.description: Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation.

inputs.name: Out z name
inputs.description: Output file name for z-stats (either as txt or image.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Var norm
inputs.description: Perform melodic variance-normalisation on data.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: Filename for glm parameter estimates (glm betas).

output-files.name: Out cope
output-files.description: Output file name for copes (either as text file or image).

output-files.name: Out f
output-files.description: Output file name for f-value of full model fit.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: File name of glm parameters (if generated).

output-files.name: Out p
output-files.description: Output file name for p-values of z-stats (either as text file or image).

output-files.name: Out pf
output-files.description: Output file name for p-value for full model fit.

output-files.name: Out sigsq
output-files.description: Output file name for residual noise variance sigma-square.

output-files.name: Out t
output-files.description: Output file name for t-stats (either as text file or image).

output-files.name: Out varcb
output-files.description: Output file name for variance of copes.

output-files.name: Out vnscales
output-files.description: Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation.

output-files.name: Out z
output-files.description: Output file name for copes (either as text file or image).
